trans-unit.source: Associates a content template in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginView"></xref> control with one or more roles defined for the Web site.
This class cannot be inherited.

You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginView> control to define a set of content templates that contain the content that is displayed to Web site users based on the role assigned by Web site administrators.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup> class is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginView> control to associate a content template with a set of roles.

To dynamically assign a template to the role group, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup.ContentTemplate%2A> property to a reference to an object that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface.
You must configure role management to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup> class.
For more information, see [Understanding Role Management](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup> class.
Indicates whether the specified user is a member of any of the roles in the role group.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup.ContainsUser%2A> method returns `true` if the specified user is a member of any of the roles associated with this role group.
Roles are searched in the order they are listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup.Roles%2A> property, and searching stops after the first match is found.
This method uses the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A> method to determine whether a user is a member of a role.
You must configure role management to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup.ContainsUser%2A> method.
For more information, see [Understanding Role Management](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6).
The user name to look for in the role group.
`true` if the user is a member of one of the roles associated with this role group; otherwise, `false`.
User is `null`.
Gets or sets the content template associated with this role group.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup.ContentTemplate%2A> property contains the content that is displayed to users who are members of this role group.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> associated with this role group.
The default value is `null`.
Gets or sets the roles associated with this role group.
A comma-separated list of roles associated with this role group.
The default is `null`.
Returns a comma-separated list of the roles associated with this role group.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup.ToString%2A> method returns the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RoleGroup.Roles%2A> property as a comma-separated list of roles associated with the role group.
A comma-separated list of the roles associated with this role group.
